project.description:
This job will deploy cloud 5 on the qa2.cloud and upgrade it to cloud 6: - 7 nodes - swift - nova (kvm)
It will wipe all QA2 machines.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TESTHEAD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: if non-empty, test latest version from Devel:Cloud Staging

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: hw_number
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the QA cloud server (we have 2,3,4)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: nodenumber
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Default nodenumber is 7 as the qa2 cloud is the default here and it has 7 nodes. Cloud qa3 has 8 nodes

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: runner_url
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The runner must be qa_crowbarsetup.sh file

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: commands
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: All the steps that needs to be completed to have cloud installed
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.defaultValue: prepareinstallcrowbar installcrowbar allocate waitcloud setup_aliases batch prepare_crowbar_upgrade crowbarbackup

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: upgrade_commands
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Steps needed to start the upgrade process

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: upgrade_cloudsource
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set new cloudsource for upgrade process

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: add update repos before crowbar install

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
admin=crowbar$hw_number cloud=qa$hw_number tempestoptions="-t -s"
export artifacts_dir=$WORKSPACE/.artifacts rm -rf $artifacts_dir mkdir -p $artifacts_dir touch $artifacts_dir/.ignore
#freshadminvm $admin #sleep 100 # time for the admin VM to boot
# rest of code runs on admin node: env | grep -e networking -e libvirt -e cloud > mkcloud.config scp mkcloud.config root@$admin: ret=0
if [ ! -z "$UPDATEREPOS" ] ; then # testing update only makes sense with GMx and without TESTHEAD unset TESTHEAD export UPDATEREPOS=${UPDATEREPOS//$'\n'/+} fi
ssh root@$admin " export cloud=$cloud ; export TESTHEAD=$TESTHEAD ; export UPDATEREPOS=$UPDATEREPOS ; export UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL=$UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL ; export cloudsource=$cloudsource ; export nodenumber=$nodenumber ; export runner_url=$runner_url ; export scenario_url=$scenario_url ; export want_node_aliases=controller=1,compute-kvm=3,storage-cinder=1,storage-swift=2 ; export scenario=\"/root/scenario.yml\" ; export commands=\"$commands\" "'
[ $UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL == "true" ] && export updatesteps="addupdaterepo runupdate"
wget --no-check-certificate -Oqa_crowbarsetup.sh "$runner_url"
wget --no-check-certificate -Oscenario.yml "$scenario_url"
timeout --signal=ALRM 240m bash -x -c ". qa_crowbarsetup.sh ; onadmin_runlist $commands" ' || ret=$?
scp root@$admin:/tmp/backup-crowbar.tar.gz "$artifacts_dir"
ssh root@$admin " export cloud=$cloud ; export TESTHEAD=$TESTHEAD ; export cloudsource=$upgrade_cloudsource ; export nodenumber=$nodenumber ; export upgrade_commands=\"$upgrade_commands\" "' timeout --signal=ALRM 60m bash -x -c ". qa_crowbarsetup.sh ; onadmin_runlist $upgrade_commands" ' || ret=$?
if [ $ret != 0 ] ; then ssh $sshopts root@$admin ' set -x for node in $(crowbar machines list | grep ^d) ; do ( echo "Collecting supportconfig from $node" timeout 400 ssh $node supportconfig | wc timeout 300 scp $node:/var/log/\*tbz /var/log/ )& done timeout 500 supportconfig | wc & wait '
scp root@$admin:/var/log/*tbz $artifacts_dir/ fi >&2
exit $ret
